name: Hook and Blade
description:
Controls:

Vive controller(Hook):

Trigger: shoot hook(propell towards hook if already stuck to something);

Grip: Retract hook ;

Vive controller(Sword):

Trigger: Propel forward(camera);

Touchpad(center):Propel backwards;

Touchpad(left):Propel left;

Touchpad(right):Propel right;

Touchpad(up):Propel up;

Touchpad(down):Propel down;
